problem_description: Create a new Flow Screen Component in src-flows that allows users to perform multi-record selection with search and filtering capabilities. The component must: 1) Support both single and multi-select modes, 2) Implement server-side search for large datasets, 3) Expose output variables for selected record IDs, 4) Include accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA).

Create an invocable Apex action that integrates with the existing automation components. The action should: 1) Accept a collection of record IDs as input, 2) Perform bulk DML operations with proper error handling, 3) Return detailed success/failure results for each record, 4) Support transaction control (allow partial commits vs. all-or-nothing). Include comprehensive unit tests with minimum 85% coverage.

validation.command: sf apex run test --test-level RunLocalTests --result-format json
